duties_responsibilities.duty: Comprehensive wealth and transfer planning for high-net-worth clients
Drives adoption of financial planning approach and the RBC Wealth Planning Platform
Conducts targeted training and development programs
Generates or coordinates creation of proposals focusing on client’s wealth transfer goals and objectives, including estate, charitable, and business succession planning solutions
Delivers the RBC planning client experience to clients with significant wealth and complex needs
Measures and reports on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business or related field, advanced degree preferred
